name: Nunnageddon III
description:
Controls: 

Move - WASD or arrow keys

Jump - SpaceBar

Attack - SHIFT

Initially, I intended to have animations for the player, enemies, and background but I was approaching the deadline and figured I should fix all of the logistical errors my game had instead of worrying about the look. I will most likely continue to update this game after the game jam to make the appearance more enticing and to fix any bugs that I might have missed. I would also like to add an alternative attack like an uppercut and add many different types of enemies like some that float in different directions or launch projectiles.
